attributes.action: Put the responsibility of reducing packaging and removing unrecyclable packaging, on to the big companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The big companies should except that it is their responserbility to reduce the amount of packaging and also to remove as much as possible the use of unrecyclable materials in packaging.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
